General.Name: China Fangda Group Co Ltd
General.Description: China Fangda Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells curtain wall materials in China and internationally. It operates in five segments: Curtain Wall, Rail Transport, Real Estate, New Energy, and Others. The company offers smart curtain walls, photovoltaic building integrated curtain walls, PVDF aluminum veneer, rail transit screen door systems, and other products; and building curtain walls, curtain wall testing, and maintenance services. It is also involved in the assembly and processing of subway screen doors; provision of screen door detection and maintenance services; development and operation of real estate properties; property management services; research and development, installation, and sale of photovoltaic equipment; engineering, design, and installation of photovoltaic power plants; and generation of photovoltaic power. The company's products are used in office buildings, urban complexes, high-end residences and hotels, urban public buildings, and other applications. China Fangda Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Building T1, Fangda Town, Shenzhen, China, 518055
